footer_sign.sign_info: We’ll send you updates on our latest launches and more. Need to take off? Unsubscribe at any time.
footer_sign.message: Look out for a welcome email.
footer_sign.email_validation: Please enter a valid email address.

travel.steps: Step 1: Choose your suitcase. Step 2: Add your bag. Step 3: Book that trip. (Yes, it's that easy.)
travel.time_fall: Just in time for fall: new limited edition Mustard, Wave, and Navy weather-resistant bags and backpacks for all your outdoor adventures.

slider.title: HOT OFF THE PRESS
slider.slide_one: Though Away has only been around for seven years, the New York-based brand has left its mark on the world—just visit any airport to see for yourself.
slider.slide_two: The suitcase that launched a thousand imitators is still best in show. January 31, 2023.
slider.slide_three: Away’s latest drop is a sleek, streamlined and updated take on the suitcases that first put the brand on the map.

getting_money.title: Give &20, get &20
getting_money.info: Everyone deserves to get away. Share with your friends and we'll give them (and you) $20 off any Away suitcase or bag.

shop_all.title: SHOP ALL
shop_all.info: Seamless travel starts here. Explore thoughtfully designed luggage, bags, and accessories for wherever you are (and wherever you’re going).

cart.title: Your cart
cart.info: Your cart is empty. Let's change that
cart.ship: Free standard shipping on orders over $100

contact_page.title: CONTACT US
contact_page.info: Looking for help? Let us know—we’re here for you.
contact_page.day: We'll get back to you within 1-2 days
contact_page.get_info: Let us know how we can help by completing the form. We typically respond in 1 - 2 business days.

about_page.about_content_one: We believe the more we travel, the better we all become. That’s why our travel essentials are designed to last (and last) for every trip to come, so you can get out there and explore.
about_page.about_content_two: We’re travelers, and our experiences inform our approach to the things we make. Simply put—our luggage is designed by travelers, for travelers. At Away, you’ll find suitcases, bags, and accessories built with thoughtful details to make each and every journey more seamless. We’re transforming travel to inspire you to get Away more and see more of the world along with us.
about_page.about_content_three: Our suitcases, bags, and accessories use materials—from polycarbonate and aluminum to water-resistant nylon—that are not only sleek and lightweight, but also high-performing, durable, and ready for whatever comes up along the way. When it comes to our luggage, the details matter, especially since they’re intentional and functional, to make the journey (from packing to unpacking and storing) seamless.

faq.size_info: Crafted with water-resistant nylon and leather trim. New extended zipper opening for easy access and visibility to main compartment
faq.warranty_info: We want you to love everything about getting Away—which is why we offer free returns and exchanges on unused items for the first 100 days. We can only accept returns on unused items, so please gently test them out at home before traveling with them.

not_found.title: Sorry, we traveled far and wide, but couldn’t find the page you were looking for.
